translations: adj.没精打采的；垂头丧气的
v.平整；打倒（flatten 的过去分词）

phrs.translation: 平击；变平，转为水平飞行

sentences.sentence: He flattened his hair down with gel.
The city has been flattened by heavy artillery bombardments.
sentences.translation: 该城市因遭重炮轰击而夷为平地。

sentences.sentence: Our team was flattened this evening!
sentences.translation: 今晚我们队被打得落花流水！
